name: Miss Golden Week (Marianne)

trigger.text: DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): Play this card.

text:
[On Play] If your Leader's type includes "Baroque Works", up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less cannot attack until the start of your next turn.
[Trigger] DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): Play this card.

effect.text: If your Leader's type includes "Baroque Works", up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less cannot attack until the start of your next turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'C' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card is a Character with a cost of 2, power of 3000, and a Counter of 1000. The Trigger effect requires 1 DON!! to be returned from the field to the DON!! deck to play the card.
